# amalitech-breadcrumb



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                             | Type                             | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `align`     | `align`     | Alignment of the breadcrumb items.      | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`  | `undefined` |
| `separator` | `separator` | Separator between the breadcrumb items. | `"arrow" \| "dot" \| "slash"`    | `undefined` |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size of the breadcrumb items.           | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
